Name: Organic Chemistry

Chirality = discrete phase transition L/D not gradual (S_complete allows continuous). Only 4 fundamental reaction mechanisms: substitution elimination addition rearrangement (S_complete allows infinite). DNA 4-base optimal = 2 bits information density maximum (S_complete allows arbitrary). Enzyme speedup = |S_complete|/|S_observable| via discrete binding sites
